0.title: Welcome to MetaCopy
0.content: Dear {username} ,Your account is verified. now you can send message to admin to increase your balance and start trading

1.title: Trade opened
1.content:
Your Trade opened at {trade_price} with ticket {trade_ticket} ,you can check it in you open trades.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

2.title: Trade closed
2.content:
Your Trade closed at {trade_exit} with ticket {trade_ticket}. your profit is {trade_profit}.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

3.title: Trade modified
3.content: Trade {trade_ticket} modified to price {trade_price} sl {trade_sl},  tp {trade_tp}

4.title: Order created
4.content: Order {order_id} Created at {order_price} . balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

5.title: Order closed
5.content:
Order closed.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

6.title: Order Deleted
6.content:
order deleted. not enough balance.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

7.title: Order modified
7.content: Trade {order_id} modified to ptrice {order_price} sl {order_sl},  tp {order_tp}

20.title: Balance increased
20.content:
your balance increase by {increase}$. current balance is {balance}$ .
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

21.title: Withdraw accept
21.content: Your Withdraw request for {withdraw_amount}$ is accepted and the amount will soon transfered to your bank account

22.title: Withdraw completed
22.content:
withdrawal successful. {withdraw_rial} Rial transfered to your bank account.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

99.title: Account Liquidated
99.content:
We are sorry to tell you your account is liquidate. you can no longer trade unless you increase your balance.
 balance: {balance}, equity: {equity}, margin: {margin}, free_margin: {free_margin}, margin_level: {margin_level}

88.title: Callmargin Alert
88.content: Your marjin level is less than {margin_level_trade}
